addr: The City College of New York, NAC 2/202. 160 Convent Avenue. New York, NY 10031
title: Screening and Discussion: Latino Americans Documentary, Episode III: War and Peace
desc: Co-sponsored by the Dominican Students Association at the City College of New York ? The screening of ?War and Peace (1942-1954)? focuses on the involvement of Latinos in World War II. It is followed with a guided discussion with Dr. Rivas-Rodriguez, Associate Professor of the School of Journalism at the University of Texas in Austin and Director of the U.S. Latino & Latina Oral History Project, ?Voces?. The discussion will focus on the multiplicity of Latino participation in the war and the different experiences of Latino subgroups.
